name: Unwelcomeness
description:
Don't stumble into places you don't belong, or you might get hurt...

Thrown into a strange place, with a strange person talking to you, you must find your way back.  Complete the puzzles and escape, if you can.

This version of the game has new features, a new layout with new puzzles, an overhauled visual style, and more!

Controls


Controls for keyboard and mouse:

  • WASD to move and mouse motion to move around
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with objects and continue/fast-forward dialog boxes
  • F to toggle the flashlight on and off
  • Left click and right click to use acquired items.
  • Escape to pause and skip dialog

Controls for Xbox 360 controller (only controller tested, others may work though):

  • Left stick to move and right stick to look around
  • A button to jump
  • X button to interact and continue/fast-forward dialog boxes
  • Y button to toggle flashlight
  • Left shoulder button and right shoulder button to use acquired items.
  • Select/Back button to pause and skip dialog
Change log: * Version 1.1.0 (09/24/2020) * Added configurable options to the game! * Mouse and Controller sensitivity is now adjustable * Volume is now adjustable from in-game * Graphics can be set to high quality or low quality. Defaults to high quality. * Version 1.0.0 (09/18/2020) * Initial release! Credits for assets used: Textures: * Flame and smoke textures by Kenney.nl (CC0) * The overwhelming majority of environment and asset textures by CC0textures.com (CC0) * Door texture by 3DTextures.me (Free, but unknown license) * Gate and character textures by TwistedTwigleg * Solid colors are from a color pallet I used in Dreams of Fire. | Fonts: * OpenDyslexicMono-Regular - opendyslexic.org (SIL-OFL) | Music and Sounds: * Drone_Atmosphere - From MatiasMacSD - From the Sonnis.com GDC 2017 Bundle * Fear and Horror - From the OpenBundle - Downloaded from GameSounds.xyz * Sound effects from the Sonnis.com GDC 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 bundles. * Dialog samples from MicreaKitsune - OpenGameArt (CC0) | Everything else: * Created by TwistedTwigleg unless otherwise noted. * (I think I credited everything used above, but if I missed something, please let me know!) Final notes:

Thank you for looking at the game! I hope you enjoy it!
